channel.title: How to change an emote to a teleport location?!?!?
channel.description: Well, i have made a teleport for an emote and everything works fine, but i dont want the teleport to say "laugh" I want it to say "kbd" on the emotes? Someone help please! :)

item.title: How to change an emote to a teleport location?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

open ZFileSearcher and type in Laugh

Read full topic
